name: bj-evalfn

body.origin:
|- wfn(cslot(c0), universe)
-| wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), c0), universe)
-| wceq(cslot(c0), cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cv(hs0), c0)))
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ Slot(c0)[Fn]𝕌
⊣ (hs0 ` c0)∈ 𝕌
⊣ Slot(c0)=(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦(hs0 ` c0))
⊣ d(hs0, 𝕌)

comment: The evaluation at a class is a function on the universal class. (General form of ~ slotfn ). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.) (Revised by BJ, 27-Dec-2021.)
